title: Bug 116829 - Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When the font size of a label is modified, the label's height does not change right away.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label.
2. Modify the font size of the label to "18 points".

OB: The label's height remains the same even after changing the font size.

EB: The label's height should adjust to accommodate the new font size.

SR: 1. Add a label.
2. Modify the font size of the label to "18 points".
